Converts the specified character to its hexadecimal value.

Determines whether the specified character is a hexadecimal digit.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description
char c

The character to check.
Returns
Type Description

True if the character is a hexadecimal digit; otherwise, false.
| Edit this page View Source

UnescapeUnicodeCodePoint(string)

Unescapes a Unicode code point and returns the corresponding character.

Declaration
public static string UnescapeUnicodeCodePoint(string point)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string point

The Unicode code point to unescape.
Returns
Type Description
string

The actual character represented by the Unicode code point.
Remarks

This method is a modified version of the code from the YamlDotNet library's Scanner class, allowing for the parsing of Unicode code points.

Extensions.ThrowIfNull<T>(T, string)
